```{r}
pca <- holes_1d_geo %>% ferrn::compute_pca()

interp <- pca$combined %>% filter(info == "interpolation") %>% dplyr::select(V1:V5) %>% as.matrix()

a <- sphere.hollow(p = 5, n = 1000)
a$points <- a$points %>% rbind(interp)
color <- c(rep("black", 1000), rep("red", nrow(interp)))
print(a, col = color)
```
